channel.title: Know Your Nodes on Godot 4 Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Know Your Nodes on Godot 4 Recipes

item.title: RayCast2D
item.description: RayCast2D Raycasting is a common technique in game development. “Casting a ray” means extending a line from a point until it collides with something or reaches its limit. Node properties Add a RayCast2D node and take a look at the Inspector: Here are the main properties you’ll need to understand: Enabled Turn this off to disabled the raycast work. Exclude Parent This property causes the ray to ignore collisions with the parent object.
